org.sensorhub.impl.module

Class ModuleConfigJsonFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sensorhub.impl.module.ModuleConfigJsonFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IModuleConfigRepository

    public class ModuleConfigJsonFile
extends Object
implements IModuleConfigRepository

    Class providing access to the configuration database that is used to persist all modules' configuration.

    Copyright (c) 2013

    Since:
    Sep 3, 2013
    Author:
    Alexandre Robin
